name: Stone (itch) (Kricketot)
description:
The Game:
    Stone is a game about breaking rocks and upgrading yourself. The main gameplay consists of you, the player, using your tools to break open rocks and obtaining what's inside of them. Breaking rocks gives you money that you can spend to upgrade your tools, or buy Auto-Drills.
Your Tools:
  • The Pickaxe: Deals damage to the rock your cursor is over.
  • The Hammer: Deals damage to rocks in a + shape around your cursor. Can also damage exposed items, so be careful!
  • The Hand: Cannot be manually selected. Allows you to pick up exposed items. Automatically activates when mousing over an item with the Pickaxe.
  • The Auto-Drill: A device that automatically breaks rocks on the same tile, but does not pick up items for you. Can be purchased like an upgrade and placed where you please.
Additional Notes:
    This game was made in 8 hours as a stress-relief project. It is by no means complete, and it is unknown if I will ever update it. Enjoy, regardless.
